headline: California American Water Completes Acquisition of Bass Lake Water Company
summary: BASS LAKE, Calif., August 19, 2025--California American Water announced today that it has completed its acquisition of the Bass Lake Water Company system. The purchase of the system, which serves approximately 1,000 customers, was previously approved by the California Public Utilities Commission (CPUC) and reflects California American Water’s ongoing commitment to strengthening water infrastructure and enhancing service in communities around the state.
